channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Belvedere charts 20-year roadmap to keep public assets in shape
item.description: The review of every city-owned road, drain, building and retaining wall will forecast what repairs will be needed and what they will cost.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Grant helps launch senior-support ‘village’ test at Strawberry complex
item.description: Marin Villages will launch a pilot program at Kruger Pines, where 56 low-income and disabled seniors live in federally subsidized units.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Legendary ice skater ‘Mr. Debonair’ reflects on career, life at 90
item.description: Hall-of-fame ice skater ‘Mr. Debonair’ Richard Dwyer, a part-time Tiburon resident, turned 90 on Nov. 18.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A server at Petite Left Bank aims to spread holiday cheer
item.description: Tracy Hobie, lead server at Petite Left Bank, spent Nov. 25 transforming the restaurant’s entrance into a winter wonderland.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Garden Plot: A DIY compost pile or worm bin can do wonders
item.description: If you have a compost pile or a worm bin, you’re well on your way to creating the amazing product some gardeners call black gold.
item.dc:creator: Diane Lynch

item.title: Friendship Kitchen in Tiburon rallies community against hunger
item.description: The packaged meals were delivered to residents at The Hilarita apartment complex on Ned’s Way and Kruger Pines in Strawberry.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
